title: My Dream Job Analysis
short_summary: Structured analysis of target roles, skills, and career positioning strategy
summary: Career strategy and analytics project focused on defining an ideal role profile, identifying skill gaps, and aligning technical and domain experience with long-term professional goals. Combines qualitative reasoning with structured analysis to guide portfolio development and job targeting.

datasets.dataset_value: Dream Job Role Criteria and Skill Mapping

components.name: Target Role Definition
components.objective: Define the characteristics, responsibilities, and expectations of an ideal target role
components.business_value: Provides a clear benchmark for evaluating job opportunities and aligning portfolio projects

components.name: Skill Gap & Readiness Analysis
components.objective: Assess current skills against target role requirements
components.business_value: Identifies high-impact skills to prioritize for learning and portfolio development

components.name: Career Action Plan
components.objective: Translate insights into an actionable career development roadmap
components.business_value: Turns abstract career goals into concrete next steps
